Title: Phase 1 — Product Validation
Description: Absolute certainty in data integrity, model accuracy, and testing rigor. All claims must be backed by evidence. Gate: Accuracy thresholds met in 3 independent datasets.

Title: Phase 2 — Monetization Architecture
Description: Controlled debut of pricing, messaging, and payment systems. Host-led presentation with founder off-stage. Gate: All tiers tested with live transactions.

Title: Genesis Key Drop — Event Execution
Description: Live event for soulbound key issuance and whale table auction. Registration, KYC-lite, and conversion flows. Gate: Dry runs passed.

Title: Recurring Revenue — Subscription Engine
Description: Subscription tiers ($500/$1,500/$5,000), insight delivery, renewal/dunning, and member observability. Gate: NPS > 50.

Title: Founder Protection — Identity, Privacy, Safety
Description: Identity insulation, threat modeling, surface minimization, and crisis playbooks. Gate: All public materials list host only.

Title: Ops Backbone — Automation, Observability, Runbooks
Description: Workflow states, zero-chance gates, dashboards, alerts, and SLOs. Gate: All automations retriable and fail-closed.
